EmailTemplate.name: Web Lead Response Email template with Image
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} for contacting MZ group we will update you soon.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},

We have received your inquiry details and our Sales reps are working on it.
We will contact you soon.

Thanks,
Sales Team,
MindZcloud Group
